entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update dotnet watch to support running .NET Aspire AppHost projects #36971
  • React template for 8.0 seems to be missing #36969
  • Worker projects published as a web project #36968
  • IIS Express project fails to build with error "Reference to type 'IPEndPoint' claims it is defined in 'System.Net.Primitives', but it could not be found" #36967
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator does not add VersionInformation to generated XmlSerializers.dll file #36964
  • NETSDK1204 error during dotnet clean on macOS when AoT enabled #36960
  • Instructions for installing the SDK for macOS through the command line are incorrect #36949

Closed

  • `dotnet tool restore` installing wrong version specified in `dotnet-tools.json` #36434
  • .NET 8: `dotnet list` looks for Nuget.Config file in .csproj file path #36945

PullRequests

Created

  • Target NetStandard2.1 in BrowserRefresh #36981
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Don't overwrite user-provided ContainerUser values #36974
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36973
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #36882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged
  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
